summary: This is an AT&T International Call Detail Record (ICDR) report listing 66 phone calls from July 6, 2019, to August 11, 2019. The report shows calls originating from and dialed to various countries, including the USA, France, UK, Switzerland, New Zealand, Belarus, Russia, and Israel. It was run on August 15, 2019, and appears to be part of a law enforcement request (Matter ID: 2790840).

events.title: Period of Recorded Phone Calls
events.description: AT&T call detail records show 66 international phone calls occurring over this period, originating from and dialed to various countries.

events.title: Call Record Report Generated
events.description: AT&T generated this International Call Detail Records (ICDR) report in response to a query (Matter ID: 2790840).

keyFacts: The document is an AT&T International Call Detail Record (ICDR) covering 66 calls from July 6 to August 11, 2019.
Calls originated from and were dialed to numerous countries, including the USA, France, UK, Switzerland, New Zealand, Belarus, Russia, and Israel.
The report was generated on August 15, 2019, under a specific Matter ID (2790840), indicating it was likely produced for a law enforcement or legal investigation.
The data shows a pattern of international communication during a critical period shortly before Jeffrey Epstein's arrest on July 6, 2019, and his death in custody on August 10, 2019.
The document header notes the records are 'for use by authorized persons only,' confirming its sensitive, investigative nature.
